Sword of the Sovereign.name: Sword of the Sovereign
Sword of the Sovereign.flavor: Your courageous example heartens your allies, steeling their resolve for victory.
Sword of the Sovereign.trigger: You score a critical hit or you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points.
Sword of the Sovereign.effect: Each target gains temporary hit points equal to your level + your Charisma modifier. Each target also gains a power bonus to attack rolls with basic attacks and at-will attacks equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of the encounter or until you drop to 0 hit points or fewer.
